Articles.Content:
I have made it my solemn vow to never leave KSP. no matter what happens, i will NOT leave this community unless KSP itself is no longer available for download. I will not let my favorite game die out!

To others who feel this way, join me in my goal of preserving the very thing we hold dear! UNITE!

I'll stick with the community - KSP itself isn't fun for me anymore unless it's several hundred parts, and then it's crashing every 2nd launch on me I build crazy things because it makes people happy.

So I'll stick around.

I'm on the list!

KSP has made me a better person, helping to give me a personality I'm proud of and a new perspective of our microscopic place in this universe. This is why I love KSP, and because of this I promise never to leave this game nor the community. I love you guys!
Haha, i imagine +30% of people here leave after a year or two with no updates.
I think that I've stuck with the game and the community too long to let go. You'll see me here for a long time.

I'll be here, forever, until the forum shuts down.

In 2020, when there is only one post per week in this forum, I'll be the one who makes that post.
